Package be.belgium.eid.security

Interface Summary
Verifiable The verifiable interface can be implemented by any object that can be verified by itself or any other object.
 

Class Summary
AuthenticationCertificate This class contains the Authentication certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
CACertificate This class contains the Certificate Authority certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
Certificate The certificate class is an abstract class for the different kinds of certificates stored on the smart card.
CertificateChain The certificate chain class represents the chain of certificates that are to be verified to verify the data on a certain smart card.
HardCodedRootCertificate The HardCodedRootCertificate class contains the hard coded root certificate for the BEID against which other certificates should be verified.
OCSPClient The OCSP client uses the Bouncy castle API to perform a single OCSP request.
RNCertificate The RN certificate is the (National Register) certificate for verifying identities.
RootCertificate This class contains the Root certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
SignatureCertificate This class contains the signature certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
 

Enum Summary
CertificateStatus Contains the different states that can occur when validating a certificate.
